name: TCSTRIKERS
description:
story



A few years after she has started her own consulting office,
the business was on track, and Techno was living a stable life.
“Feels like we're always getting the same offer.”
“That means you've become experienced (fat) to get to say that.”
Techno trusts Joshua, who's been her assistant since the beginning.
“Umm, I'll just take a walk for a while.”

“I wanna drink some fizzy drink. Oops. Pushed the Oshiruko button.
Good thing Joshua is gonna drink it anyway.”
(What's that? A creature? So huge!)
“What? Did anyone say something?”
A woman dressed strange was looking at Techno, looking as if she
was being stared at by a cow.
(That creature is staring at me...Can that see me?)
“What's the matter?”
(Crap! Gotta run and tell my boss.)
“Hey! Wait the hell up!”
Techno ran after the woman dressed strange.

○How to Power Up

•When you defeat the enemy and P items fall.
•Power up if you keep touching the P item.


○Technical Shoot

The boss's special attack and how well it breaks through
will change your evaluation points.

3point:nomiss,nobomb and defeat in time
2point:nomiss,nobomb and defeat out of time
1point:nomiss and one bomb
0point:miss ore two bomb
